snippet.title: Gladiator Guild Manager - Trailer
snippet.description:
Support us on Kickstarter: http://kck.st/2DLIb5M

Wishlist Free Prologue (Coming Very Soon): https://store.steampowered.com/app/1332470/Gladiator_Guild_Manager_Prologue/

Wishlist Full Game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1043260/Gladiator_Guild_Manager/

Game Description:
Gladiator Guild Manager is a battle sim strategy about managing your gladiator team in an epic fantasy world. Build and run your own guild, hire and develop gladiators, figure out unique tactics, manage resources, conquer arenas and test your skills.
